description: Routine annual checkup with general health questions

lines.speaker: Doctor
lines.text: This is your annual checkup. How have you been feeling overall?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: Pretty good, just a bit tired lately. I've been working long hours.

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: I usually get about 5 to 6 hours. I have trouble falling asleep.

lines.speaker: Doctor
lines.text: Any changes in your diet or exercise routine?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: I've been eating more fast food because of work. Haven't had time to exercise.

lines.speaker: Doctor
lines.text: Have you noticed any weight changes?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: I think I've gained about 10 pounds over the past few months.
